Modifications.Value: Hero is a veteran warrior of many battles. Gives a percent chance to avoid attacks and a 25% chance to deal additional damage. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 10% dodge, 2 times normal damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 15% dodge, 2.5 times normal damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 20% dodge, 3 times normal damage.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 25% dodge, 3.5 times normal damage

Gives a 15% chance to dodge an attack and a 25% chance to do 2.5 times normal damage.
Gives a 20% chance to dodge an attack and a 25% chance to do 3 times normal damage.
